channel.title: Conquest 317 - Time To Start Your Journey!
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://puu.sh/3dGTl.png[/img]
Welcome to the official project thread for the current server I am working on. The current name of the server is [COLOR="#ADD8E6"]Conquest[/COLOR], before the server moves on to hosting stages the name may change depending if I decide to keep it.
[CENTER]Introduction: [COLOR="#ADD8E6"]Conquest[/COLOR] is a project of mine that I wish to continue to build on, and to, eventually host and have other people play and enjoy it. By the time the server is ready for hosting most (if not all) things that were related to other servers (as my base was a random PI) will be removed, new areas will be added, new bosses to fight, and new dungeons filled with monsters. [/CENTER]
[B][U]Current Progress: Updates Completed: 650/800 (required for beta: 600 | required for release: 800+)[/U][/B]
[B][I][U]Media: [/U][/I][/B]
Home Media: [SPOILER=Home Media] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_17.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=758834256324[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_14.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=97253365209[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_15.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=432131789158[/img] [/SPOILER]
Training Teleports: [SPOILER=Training Media] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_16.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=885512762702[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_12.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=95749212196[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_7.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=747028507058[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_5.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=501764330313[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_4.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=341230053454[/img] [/SPOILER]
Skilling Areas: [SPOILER=Skilling Media] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_8.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=80689455149[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_9.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=649287489009[/img] [/SPOILER]
Bosses and MiniGames: [SPOILER=Boss Media] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_13.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=565600252709[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_6.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=422290244139[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_1.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=267344892024[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_10.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=465632939245[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_2.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=557546423747[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_3.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=6416627438[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_11.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=513453372520[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H388dP5hUWc&feature=youtu.be]Null - YouTube[/url] [/SPOILER]
Latest Updates: [code] Finally finished up doing most of the big updates, now should be smooth sailing. I'll be rolling out more content as soon as I test all the current content. The thread has been re-done also as well as the server now being ready to enter it's beta phase.[/code]
Please comment below on what could be done / what could be changed, thanks for viewing. ^^
Updated: 6/12/2013
[B][U]Urgent:[/U][/B] Server is now open for BETA if interested please fill out the application below: [code] 1. Why do you want to be a beta tester? 2. Are you good at exposing bugs, and/or finding dupes and other things that cause problems for servers? 3. Will you come forward right away with any Bug/Dupe/Glitch/etc you may find? 4. Contact method? 6. Did you notice there wasn't a #5? [/code]
Support my server? Add this code to your signature and show your support! [code] [Xurl=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/490953-conquest-317-time-start-your-journey.html][Ximg]http://i.imgur.com/TWjn20f.png[/img][/url] [/code] Remove the two X's from the code above and it will look like this: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/490953-conquest-317-time-start-your-journey.html][img]http://i.imgur.com/TWjn20f.png[/img][/url]
Thanks for your time everyone! [/CENTER]

item.title: Conquest 317 - Time To Start Your Journey!
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

Solid snake:

Wow this is looking good! I really like your thread layout, you should remove your SPOILER tags though as these forums don’t include them.

Thanks mate, I know I just updated the thread today glad you like it. And thanks for the support!

Read full topic

item.title: Conquest 317 - Time To Start Your Journey!
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[CENTER]

3dGTl.png728×90

Welcome to the official project thread for the current server I am working on. The current name of the server is [COLOR="#ADD8E6"]Conquest[/COLOR], before the server moves on to hosting stages the name may change depending if I decide to keep it.

[CENTER]Introduction:
[COLOR="#ADD8E6"]Conquest[/COLOR] is a project of mine that I wish to continue to build on, and to, eventually host and have other people play and enjoy it. By the time the server is ready for hosting most (if not all) things that were related to other servers (as my base was a random PI) will be removed, new areas will be added, new bosses to fight, and new dungeons filled with monsters. [/CENTER]

Current Progress:
Updates Completed: 650/800 (required for beta: 600 | required for release: 800+)

Media:

Home Media:
[SPOILER=Home Media]



[/SPOILER]

Training Teleports:
[SPOILER=Training Media]





[/SPOILER]

Skilling Areas:
[SPOILER=Skilling Media]


[/SPOILER]

Bosses and MiniGames:
[SPOILER=Boss Media]







Null - YouTube
[/SPOILER]

Latest Updates:

Finally finished up doing most of the big updates, now should be smooth sailing. I'll be rolling out more content as soon as I test all the current content. The thread has been re-done also as well as the server now being ready to enter it's beta phase.

Please comment below on what could be done / what could be changed, thanks for viewing. ^^

Updated: 6/12/2013

Urgent:
Server is now open for BETA if interested please fill out the application below:

1. Why do you want to be a beta tester?
2. Are you good at exposing bugs, and/or finding dupes and other things that cause problems for servers?
3. Will you come forward right away with any Bug/Dupe/Glitch/etc you may find?
4. Contact method?
6. Did you notice there wasn't a #5?

Support my server? Add this code to your signature and show your support!

[Xurl=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/490953-conquest-317-time-start-your-journey.html][Ximg]http://i.imgur.com/TWjn20f.png[/img][/url]

Remove the two X’s from the code above and it will look like this:

Thanks for your time everyone!
[/CENTER]
